skillTree.localised_description: Years of fighting and bumping into things has toughed up Halagrundsor's outer skin, until he's basically armoured all over. Makes it hard to enemies to shoot him, which he likes.
Marching up and down, and trying to keep up with horses, has taught Halagrundsor that moving a bit more quickly than the average giant can be advantageous. It also gets him to the beer kegs faster.
Wielding his bulk like a shield, Halagrundsor protects those around him.
Halagrundsor might be friendly, but when he crashes into his foes, they still go flying. He's a giant, after all.

ui_effects.localised_text: Increases this unit's ability to knock enemies back while active

stat_effects.description: x0.025 Dealt Collision Knocked Back Threshold
x0.022 Dealt Collision Knocked Down Threshold
x0.02 Dealt Collision Knocked Flying Threshold

skillTree.localised_description: Halagrundsor has a particular dislike for Greenskins, and makes sure to turn the strange fungi-creatures back into the vegetable paste from which they came.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins
Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Halagrundsor always carries around a keg of beer. Mostly it's for drinking, but if needed... it's a weapon.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: It takes a lot of food and drink to satisfy Halagrundsor. Good thing he's a giant and always carries it with him.
Anyone foolish enough to pick on Halagrundsor's friends finds out what a bad idea that is.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Halagrundsor the Horrible is a mercenary Giant that was hired by local Imperial merchants to patrol and guard caravans that moved along the World's Edge Mountains, and he takes preventing violence very seriously.
